page.title: 06HAMPTON HILL HIGH STREET
page.content: { A busy street of small family-owned {businesses eg. Cavan Bakery:}family firm since 1937; bakery on that site since 1897. {Burt's Cycles:}Family firm since 1945. Shops like these providing a wide range of goods draw regular customers who prefer the street to large centres eg. Kingston. {Goods available range from 1p sweet to {Â£400 bicycle. Shop keepers don't favour Sunday opening because of extra costs. {4 pubs}originally to serve Irish railway navvies.{ 5 food shops}open beyond normal hours, a{bookshop,}a {clothes shop, newsagent, florist, dry {cleaners}and{butchers shop. 2 bus services to Kingston and Richmond, cost 30p, 15p for children. Free car parking available on street.
